**Wikipedia summary**:  
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p><i><b>Pyropia</b></i> is a genus of red algae in the family Bangiaceae. It is found around the world in intertidal zones and shallow water. The genus has folding frond-like blades which are either red, brown or green. Some <i>Pyropia</i> species are used to create nori, and are thus important subjects for aquaculture.
